name: Dark Lights
description:
This game was created for Mini Jam 101: Limit

You woke up in a odd place full of strange enemys. Buy upgrades from the Merchant and survive as long as you can against the increasing number of enemys ...and with every kill your eyesight becomes more limeted.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Moving

Mouse - Aiming

Left Click - Shooting

E - Devastating  Tree Attack

The game was made with 1080p in mind. If you encounter any issues please change your desktop resolution to 1080p.
